message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's worth it for me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
